## KeyboardAdaptorContinuousEvent interface

Event: Fired when a key in a `continuous` KeyboardAdaptor's mapping is pressed (`onKeyDown`<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface KeyboardAdaptorContinuousEvent extends ContinuousEvent 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ContinuousEvent](./controls.continuousevent.md)

## Example


```javascript
adaptor.on('update', () => {
  // do something
})

```
